title: Kybalion: A Study of the Hermetic Philosophy of Ancient Egypt and Greece
description: The precepts of Hermetic philosophy remained shrouded in secrecy for more than 2,000 years, clouded by obscure language and dense allegories. This concise guide offers a modern interpretation of the doctrine, distilling its teachings with seven compelling principles that can be applied to self-development in daily life.
author: Three Initiates
